item.title: CoSocial Community Cooperative
item.description: CoSocial Officially the Cosocial Community Cooperative, you can find out more on the website » [[Mastodon]] server https://cosocial.ca – follow @coop@cosocial.

item.title: Tomo Spaces
item.description: Tomo Spaces is a real estate company building at the intersection of “hardwhere” and “softwhere,” where physical space and intangible activities meet.
